result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Possess Body Armor - Convicted V. Felon

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Diamontae Darnell Love

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love not in court, in custody.  Appearance waived.  Attorney May Y Lee in court for Diamontae Darnell Love.  Assistant District Attorney Jessica Bellows in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Discovery has been reviewed, defense is awaiting DNA and Medical records, therefore requesting an additional scheduling hearing.  Court agreed to adjourn this matter.  Case remains calendared in Br 45.  Because Br 45 is anticipating being in trial, this hearing will be held in Room 423 of the safety building.  mn

An Amended Information was filed with just the dates of offense amended. Defense counsel waived reading of the Complaint and entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant. Defense has no objection to the amended dates.  Case remains calendared in Br 45. Scheduling conference scheduled for 10/28/22 at 9 a.m. mn

Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney May Y Lee in court for Diamontae Darnell Love.   Assistant District Attorney Jessica Bellows in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds the State has complied with victim notification.  Bail hearing proceeded.  Statements made by Defense and State.  The Court finds the bail motion is premature and DENIED defense motion.  Defendant on VOP hold.  Defense has received an offer, however some outstanding Discovery and DNA results have not been received, defense has requested an adjourned scheduling date.

Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love not in court, in custody.  Attorney May Y Lee in court for Diamontae Darnell Love.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica Bellows in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant's appearance waived.  Defense has received Discovery  but no offer to date.  Defense motion for bail modification was not heard due to the need for victim notification.  This matter is adjourned in Br 45.  mn
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Def Motion to Modify Bond, Filed.
Stipulation and order for substitution of Attorneys, Filed.

Adjustment Number: 22A 088486,
Payable Number: 1032584,
Receipt Number: 22RP037226,
Amount: $20.00

Attorney Heather L. Johnson in court, defendant Diamontae Darnell Love not in court, in custody, defendants appearance waived.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is currently on a VOP hold, therefore defense withdrew the motion to modify bail.  Case remains calendared in Br 45 for scheduling.  mn  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love in court with Attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer N. Waszak.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.    All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Br 45, room G55 in CJF  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with A.K.,
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Diamontae Darnell Love in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, Branch 34.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he/she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he/she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
